name: @origyn/perpetualos-context
description: Parses ORIGYN PerpetualOS URLs which access resources in an Internet Computer canister implementing the ORIGYN NFT Standard.
author: ORIGYN Foundation

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && vite build --mode production
scripts.test: npm run build && jest src/__tests__/unit --config jestconfig.json
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && jest src/__tests__/integration --config jestconfig.json
